events.comment: First of all I want to thank you for buying my item. I hope it helps you making some good stuff with construct 2 game engine. If you have any questions or if you need further help, don't hesitate to contact me
Egg N Pot is a coolest game to improve your reaction time with clicks and tap. Throw the egg into the moving pots. Have Fun.
Throw the egg into the moving pots. Do not miss the pot or let it fall to ground. Up Arrow or Tap to throw egg.

variable.comment: number of eggs to be created. take care of layout size if you are increasing the number
variable.name: maxPots

events.comment: All the objects that are to be created at runtime are destoyed.
Intially deactivated. This determine the condtions at falling of platform

sub-events.comment: add socres once on falling on pot

events.comment: game play logic.Here you can play with actions to manipulate the motion of pot, its speed,nature of sine wave etc.

sub-events.comment: fine control on scorllTo using a custom camer with lerp()
resets the game after the failed attempt
complete the game, when user reaches the last egg

events.comment: laoding the game objects at run time

sub-events.comment: some commented code is useful for debuging
